Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Delport, no run, good length at off stump, slight shape away, punched on the up to mid-off
Mohammad Amir to Delport, 3 runs, good length at off stump, gives it the charge and lifts it over mid-off as the bat turns in his hands
Mohammad Amir to McCullum, 1 run, back of a length on the pads, glanced to short fine's left
Mohammad Amir to Delport, no run, bouncer at off stump, sways away and drops his wrists to let it go

Mohammad Amir to Delport, OUT, what a catch! Bouncer angled down the leg, goes for the hook, gets a glove. It flies high to Sanga's right but he's leaped and held on with his right hand. He was still in the air as he took it, full stretch
Wicket: ['CS Delport c †Sangakkara b Mohammad Amir 3 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Fakhar Zaman, no run, good length outside off, careless waft at it without any feet, beaten
Imad Wasim to McCullum, no run, full outside off, driven back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to McCullum, 1 run, good length at off stump, goes back and pushes it to deep midwicket
Imad Wasim to Fakhar Zaman, no run, good length, sliding away from outside off, lets it go
Imad Wasim to Fakhar Zaman, 2 runs, good length outside off, swept to deep square's left
Imad Wasim to Fakhar Zaman, no run, good length, slid across from off stump, chopped straight to backward point
Imad Wasim to Fakhar Zaman, SIX, good length outside off, gets on one knee and nails the slog sweep right off the middle and straight into the empty spectator area at the midwicket boundary
Mohammad Amir to McCullum, no run, good length in the corridor, squares him up with the angle, defended to point
Mohammad Amir to McCullum, 1 run, short at the chest, miscues the pull shot and it goes off his body to short fine
Mohammad Amir to Fakhar Zaman, no run, back of a length outside off, tries to chop it between first slip and short third and gets it straight to slip
Mohammad Amir to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, bouncer at middle, he's late on the pull shot, gets a top edge but it lands well wide of Pollard at mid-on
Mohammad Amir to McCullum, 2 leg byes, 148 kph, full at leg stump, attempted flick raps him on the pads and rolls down to fine leg, phew that was quick
Mohammad Amir to McCullum, FOUR, back of a length in the corridor, arches backwards and ramps it neatly over short third man
Sohail Khan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, back of a length in the corridor, pushes straight to backward point off the back foot
Sohail Khan to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, short and wide, waits for it and finds the gap between backward point and cover point
Sohail Khan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, back of a length outside off, dabbed to short third man
Sohail Khan to McCullum, 1 run, back of a length at middle, tries to heave this behind square on the leg side, gets an inside edge onto body into off side infield
Sohail Khan to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, short and wide, stands on his toes and slaps it in front of cover point
Sohail Khan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, bouncer at middle, gets nice bounce and carry past Zaman's attempted hook
Usman Khan to McCullum, 1 run, good length, angled across the right hander from middle stump, plays close to the body and pushes it to extra cover
Usman Khan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, short and at the batsman's mid-riff, nudged towards midwicket off the back foot
Usman Khan to McCullum, no run, Baz steps out, gets followed down the leg side with a slower bouncer, has to sway away from it in the end, good direction on the bouncer

Usman Khan to McCullum, no run, short at middle stump, makes room and nails the cut shot this time, but it's straight to Imad at backward point who is pumped up and seems to have something to say very audibly
Usman Khan to McCullum, FOUR, back of a length at middle stump, clears the front leg and slap-slogs it over midwicket, one bounce
Usman Khan to McCullum, no run, slower ball, good length at middle stump, makes room and slaps it to covers
Sohail Khan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, back of a length outside off, backs away to slice it through, but is beaten on the outside edge with his attempted cut

Sohail Khan to Fakhar Zaman, OUT, back of a length outside off, angled across, Zaman didn't need to do too much - all the fielders are in on the off side. But his eyes have lit up, hands have hardened and he's slapped it on the up straight to backward point at face height
Sohail Khan to Umar Akmal, 1 run, wide of the crease, short of good length outside off, walks across and pushes it wide of mid-on
Wicket: ['Fakhar Zaman c Imad Wasim b Sohail Khan 19 (15b 2x4 1x6) SR: 126.66']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to McCullum, 1 run, back of the hand slower ball, dropped short outside off, hangs back and pulls it to deep square
Sohail Khan to Umar Akmal, no run, good length, angled in at off stump, closes the face too early as he tries to nudge this into the leg side, leading edge doesn't fly too far
Sohail Khan to Umar Akmal, no run, back of a length outside off, back foot defence
Usman Khan to McCullum, FOUR, goes around, bowls short and wide, he throws his hands at it, gets it off the bottom but there's still enough pace on it for it to fly past point
Usman Khan to McCullum, no run, good length at middle stump, pushed to covers off the back foot
Usman Khan to McCullum, 1 run, good length at the pads, pushed to deep midwicket
Usman Khan to Umar Akmal, 1 run, back of a length outside off, gets on top of the bounce and opens the face to run it down to third man
Usman Khan to McCullum, no run, back of length at middle, back foot defence
Usman Khan to McCullum, 2 runs, slower ball, back of a length at middle, goes for the pull, badly timed, gets it in front of deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, SIX, classy! Tossed up outside off, steps out, makes room, and launches it inside-out over extra cover
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, full toss at off stump, punched to deep midwicket
Usama Mir to McCullum, FOUR, full outside off, vicious cover drive that should've been stopped by cover, who has dived over it...bad effort
Usama Mir to McCullum, FOUR, dropped short at middle, hangs back and pulls it between the fielders on the leg side boundary
Usama Mir to McCullum, no run, good length outside off, front foot defence
Usama Mir to McCullum, no run, good length at off stump, grips, turns and bounces, gets it high on the bat as he plays a forward defence
Imad Wasim to Umar Akmal, 1 run, full outside off stump, driven to long-on
Imad Wasim to McCullum, 1 run, good length at middle, goes back and pushes it from in front of his pads to deep midwicket
Imad Wasim to Umar Akmal, no run, good length outside off, steps out early and checks his shot. Rides the turn and pushes it to point
Imad Wasim to Umar Akmal, 1 run, good length at off stump, steps out and punches to long-off
Imad Wasim to McCullum, no run, good length at middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to McCullum, no run, drags it down the leg side but he hits the pull shot straight to short fine - just needed to get it on either side of that fielder for a four
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, tossed up at leg stump, driven to long-on
Usama Mir to McCullum, 1 run, full at off stump, hangs back, clears the front leg and drills it aerially, straight to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, no run, steps out early, beaten in flight, pushed to point
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, tossed up at middle stump, steps out and thumps it back past the bowler's right. Babar run's to his left and misses with his hands but stops with his legs

Usama Mir to McCullum, OUT, tossed up at middle stump, goes for the slog sweep, gets it off the bottom of the bat and it's sliced towards Babar at long-on, who doesn't need help from his feet this time other than to run a few yards to his left to get under that - safely pouched
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, no run, good length outside off, defended off the front foot
Shoaib Malik to Narine, 1 run, full at leg stump, punched towards long-on, Malik reckons Akmal blocked him as he tried to field that, but he didn't even move, no controversy
Wicket: ['BB McCullum c Babar Azam b Usama Mir 31 (28b 5x4 0x6) SR: 110.71']

Commentary: Shoaib Malik to Umar Akmal, 1 run, good length at the pads, pushed to short fine, would've been out with a direct hit

Shoaib Malik to Narine, no run, good length, looped outside off, draws him in for a drive but he isn't to the pitch, Misses, back leg drags slightly as Sanga whips the bails off...sent upstairs...and it looks like he's in. Not-out.

Shoaib Malik to Narine, 1 run, good length outside off, this time he charges at it and gets an outside edge that flies over point who has walked in too far. Short third man runs behind him and sweeps up
Shoaib Malik to Umar Akmal, no run, full at the pads, turned off the wrists, straight to short fine
Shoaib Malik to Umar Akmal, 1 run, short at the leg stump, pulled straight to deep square
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, full at leg stump, leans forward and turns it into the leg side
Usama Mir to Narine, SIX, good call! Tossed up at off stump, takes one step towards the ball and lifts it cleanly over Pollard at long-on
Usama Mir to Narine, no run, good length outside off, goes deep and punches off the back foot to covers
Usama Mir to Narine, 1 run, full at middle stump, heaved to deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, 1 run, good length at off stump, leans in and drops it in front of short third man. It's always close with a direct hit for Narine, but they've misfired yet another throw

Usama Mir to Narine, SIX, tossed up at middle, attempted googly. This time he doesn't even have to take a step towards it - stays put, gets the bat above his shoulder and brings down a neat arc to make Pollard turn around and look for the ball again at the long-on boundary
Shoaib Malik to Umar Akmal, 1 run, full at middle stump, tucked to midwicket's right
Shoaib Malik to Narine, 1 run, good length at middle stump, pushed in front of extra cover
Shoaib Malik to Umar Akmal, 1 run, full at the pads, turned to short fine with soft hands

Shoaib Malik to Narine, OUT, and that's the end of the show. Steps out, but Malik has dropped it short in anticipation. It's outside off and spins away as he tries to hit on the up and gets a thick outside edge to Imad Wasim at point
Shoaib Malik to Umar Akmal, 1 run, full on the pads, pushed to deep square
Shoaib Malik to Elliott, no run, good length outside off, pushes forward and pokes at it expecting it to go on with the angle, but it spins back and into the big gap between bat and pad

Usama Mir to Umar Akmal, OUT, ...turns out Akmal is not happy to just hang in there. Tossed up at middle, shapes to lift this over midwicket, slightly squared up, gets it off the bottom and chips an easy one to long-on
Wicket: ['SP Narine c Imad Wasim b Shoaib Malik 16 (9b 0x4 2x6) SR: 177.77']

Commentary: Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, turns away slightly, cut to point
Usama Mir to Elliott, 1 run, good length outside off, goes forward and follows the spin with his hands to poke it to point
Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, good length at off stump, the slip is out and so obviously he gets an outside edge this time...rolls to short third man's left and he puts in a slide
Usama Mir to Elliott, 1 run, good length at middle stump, sweeps it on the up, flat and one bounce to deep midwicket
Wicket: ['Umar Akmal c Babar Azam b Usama Mir 20 (22b 0x4 1x6) SR: 90.90']

Commentary: Usama Mir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, good length at middle stump, swept along the floor to deep midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, full outside off, gets low and drags it with a sweep, straight to square leg
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, good length at middle, gets slow and sweeps it to long leg

Shoaib Malik to Elliott, OUT, another collapse? full at off stump, walks across and tries to get under this to try and slog it over the midwicket boundary, it's too full, there's no room for him and it lobs up for Usman at square leg to run a few yards to his left and take it in the infield
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, full at off stump, leans forward and pushes it to deep midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, good length at leg stump, pushed into the open leg side
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, back of a length outside off, spins back in, he goes deep and bunts it into the off side
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, back of a length on the pads, tucked into the midwicket region, looking for two but Amir gets across quickly
Mohammad Amir to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, back of a length outside off, dropped into the off side off the back foot
Wicket: ['GD Elliott c Usman Khan b Shoaib Malik 2 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, back of a length at middle stump, wants to whip this into the leg side but it thumps him on the back thigh
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, full at leg stump, jammed out to deep midwicket's left
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, 145 kph, hurries onto his pads from a good length, jumps up and tucks it to short fine
Mohammad Amir to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, back of a length at middle stump, turns it to fine leg off the back foot

Shoaib Malik to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, good length outside off, goes for the sweep, it's rising at him and gets the top edge. Sohail Khan isn't quick at he runs to his right from short fine and he can't get there
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, good length on the pads, pushed to square leg off the back foot
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, full on the pads, gets low and sweeps straight to short fine
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, dropped short, moves around too much and jams himself as he plays a pull shot and just gets it past square leg
Shoaib Malik to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, good length outside off, mistimed cut straight to point
Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, tossed up outside off, waits for it and slices it uppishly, one bounce to short third man
Sohail Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, SIX, back of a length at off stump, goes deep and swings hard at this, gets it high on the bat and it flies over the square leg boundary
Sohail Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, back of the hand slower ball, short and wide, slapped straight to point
Sohail Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, slower ball out of the back of the hands again, hangs back and pulls it to deep square

Sohail Khan to Sohail Tanvir, 2 runs, bouncer angled across off stump, goes for the hook, gets a top edge and Usama runs backwards from short fine and runs circles before dropping it. Difficult chance, that went high

Sohail Khan to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, bouncer outside off again, this time he gets on top of the bounce and slaps it in front of square on the off side...runs back almost two-thirds of the pitch for the second but is sent back by Rizwan
Sohail Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, FOUR, full at leg stump, walks across, gets low and uses the angle to ramp it over short fine. Good shot.
Mohammad Amir to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, full at off stump, stays in his crease and goes for the slog, but his weight is going backwards as he's barely leaned forward. Couple of bounces down to long-on
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, 141 kph, yorker at leg stump, pushed to deep square
Mohammad Amir to Sohail Tanvir, FOUR, short and angled into his chest, hangs back and pulls it past fine leg with the angle
Mohammad Amir to Sohail Tanvir, FOUR, brings mid-off into the circle and bowls a length ball outside off, Tanvir accepts it and hits on the up over extra cover
Mohammad Amir to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, yorker at middle stump, clears the front leg and whips it out to deep midwicket

Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Rizwan, 2 runs, full toss at off stump, shapes to ramp it fine, see the angle and flips the bat to try and find the third man boundary insted. In the end, the ball hits the bat, not the other way round, and it crawls through the square leg region
Usman Khan to Sohail Tanvir, 2 runs, full at middle stump, goes for the slog, once more he stands tall and doesn't lean in, gets it on the bottom and it goes without too much power to deep midwicket
Usman Khan to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, slower ball, full on the pads, tries to flick it behind square, catches an inside edge on the pads and it rolls into the gully region
Usman Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, FOUR, what a shot! Yorker at off stump, gets low, keeps his eyes on the ball and reverse ramps it past short third man
Usman Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, yorker at off stump, digs it out to mid-off
Usman Khan to Sohail Tanvir, 1 run, yorker at off stump, punched down to long-on
Usman Khan to Mohammad Rizwan, 1 run, full at off stump, steps out and gets a thick inside edge to square leg
